newsitem.title: CHINA: China interbank market rates (CHIBOR) mixed.
newsitem.headline: China interbank market rates (CHIBOR) mixed.

text.p: Following is the China Interbank Offered Rate (CHIBOR) for Saturday issued by the official Xinhua news agency on behalf of the People's Bank of China, the central bank.
The figures represent weighted averages and not closing prices and are annual percentage rates.

Specific volume figures were unavailable, but traders said trading was very slow with rates moving in a narrow range. Many banks and short-term financial centres, money brokerages run by the central bank, were absent ahead of the three-day holiday.
The closure of other financial markets, in particular the Shanghai and Shenzhen stock exchanges, made fund demand very weak, they said.
The exchange will be closed from Sunday to Tuesday to mark the Chinese takeover of Hong Kong.
Traders said they expected the interbank rates to move narrowly in slow trade next Wednesday when trading resumes.
